description: All main characters are at their respective homes, some of them calling each other via telephone, while a radio show airs an interview with http://anidb.net/ch29912 [Sayama Shouko-san] from SAIL who then performs "http://anidb.net/s5096 [Hatsukoi]" (a song about a http://anidb.net/ch17740 [boy] who fell in love with a http://anidb.net/ch17737 [female track&field athlete] but is unable to get his feelings across to her), to a collection of highlight scenes of the anime series.
